comment_body: I nearly always get the twist in SSS,  but not this one very enjoyable :))

*It's haunted as fuck!*

Nicely done OP! Enjoyable and not the ending I expected!
This was a great, creepy story! The ending made me laugh. I could imagine myself, running out of a house, yelling "It's haunted as fuck!" Lol!
Hehe, thanks! Glad you liked it ☺️
